definition: to unblock/to dredge/to clear the way/to get things flowing/to facilitate/to mediate/to lobby/to explicate (a text)
surname Shu
variant of 疏[shu1]
to dredge/to clear away obstruction/thin/sparse/scanty/distant (relation)/not close/to neglect/negligent/to present a memorial to the Emperor/commentary/annotation
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
facilitation payment/bribe

sentences.english: As sick patients were hospitalized, the treatment given, usually a nebulizer that could open up clogged lung passages, actually disseminated the virus further.
sentences.chinese: 在病人入院后，通常会给以雾化治疗来疏通肺部阻塞。

sentences.english: The patients with poor blood supply were pretreated with drugs to enlarge blood vessels and improve microcirculation.
sentences.chinese: 血供差者适当给予扩血管及疏通微循环药。

sentences.english: The wisdom of water makes rivers flow.
sentences.chinese: 水的智慧能疏通江河，可以自成盈满。

sentences.english: The dispute was settled by mediation.
sentences.chinese: 这场争端通过疏通而得到解决。

sentences.english: The workers are unblocking the sewer to prevent the leakage of dirty water.
sentences.chinese: 工人们正在疏通下水管道，防止脏水外泄。

sentences.english: The blackmailer will have to be bought off, or he'll ruin your good name.
sentences.chinese: 得花些钱疏通那个敲诈者，否则他会毁坏你的声誉。

sentences.english: The words by the right to the role transformation from the language appropriate to the occasion, dredge relational.
sentences.chinese: 话语由权利向词令，疏通关系的角色转变。

sentences.english: The call for the rate cut came despite the efforts by the Fed to unclog the financial system.
sentences.chinese: 尽管美联储努力疏通金融体系，但降息呼声日高。

sentences.english: This is the ventilation shaft through which air leaves a mine.
sentences.chinese: 这是煤矿上用来疏通空气的通风井。

sentences.english: Movement- rhythm and dance like anyoneifest of freedom.
sentences.chinese: 疏通，韵律和舞蹈，有自在表达的特征。

sentences.english: Where does Heze dredge a sewer going round to look for?
sentences.chinese: 菏泽疏通下水道到哪里去找？

sentences.english: The movement to stop this "dirty oil" has gathered momentum.
sentences.chinese: 阻碍临蓐这种“脏油”的疏通已经造成势头。

sentences.english: They say the port also needs to be dredged so larger ships can get closer for loading and unloading.
sentences.chinese: 此外，为了让大型船只停靠还得挖掘疏通这个港口。

sentences.english: Moving blood is used for places of stagnation or stasis of blood and used in menstrual problems.
sentences.chinese: 血液凝滞和月经问题时需要血液疏通。

sentences.english: Analyzing and disentangling this way is the focus of my article.
sentences.chinese: 分析并疏通这条道路，就是本文的工作。
你必要去疏通陶冶一下。

definition: unobstructed/clear
choked with silt/silted up
to clog up/blockage
unimpeded/free-flowing/straight path/unclogged/move without obstruction
to silt up/silt/sediment/ooze/slurry
to clarify (disparate material into a coherent narrative)/to marshal an argument
to dredge/to open up a path for/to remove obstructions/to clear the way/to enlighten/persuasion
energy channels/meridian (TCM)/(dialect) trick/tactic
to straighten out/to sort out/to organize
to block/to clog
to open access/to establish contact/to remove a block/to put through (a phone connection)
to clear away/to eliminate/to get rid of
silted up/obstructed by silt/variant of 瘀滯|瘀滞[yu1 zhi4]
to nurse one's health/to recuperate/to take care of/to look after/to discipline/to educate/to train/to prepare food/(dialect) to make fun of/(medicine) to opsonize
ventilation/aeration/to keep each other informed/to release information
to mend
